attacks.name: Shaky Fall
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

ability.name: Giant Water Shuriken

cards.name: Greninja BREAK
text: Greninja BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.

cards.name: Pokémon Catcher

cards.name: Professor Sycamore
text: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.

cards.name: Psychic's Third Eye
text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. Discard as many cards as you like from your hand. Then, draw that many cards.

cards.name: Puzzle of Time
text: You may play 2 Puzzle of Time cards at once. • If you played 1 card, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order. • If you played 2 cards, put 2 cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Reverse Valley
text: Choose which way this card faces before you play it. Any damage done to this ↓ player's Metal Pokémon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Choose which way this card faces before you play it. The attacks of this ↓ player's Darkness Pokémon do 10 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
